title: SMS-Based Introductory Programming Learning Support Course for [Large-Scale] Education

context.additional_context: Introductory programming course for current practitioners, utilizing SMS-based learning support tools in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic programming concepts (variables, conditionals, loops) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can complete and submit 70% or more of weekly programming assignments.
Learners can utilize problem-solving strategies three or more times using hints/questions provided via SMS.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
